code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{apiSlice}from'./api/apiSlice';import categoriesSlice from'./categories/categoriesSlice';import productsSlice from'./products/productsSlice';import userSlice from'./user/userSlice';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{categories:categoriesSlice,products:productsSlice,user:userSlice,[apiSlice.reducerPath]:apiSlice.reducer},middleware:getMiddleware=>getMiddleware().concat(apiSlice.middleware),devTools:true});
